mapper.sql:
select v_num, v_name, v_phone, v_date, v_time, v_status from visit_tbl
to_char(v_date, 'yyyy/mm/dd')= to_char(sysdate, 'yyyy/mm/dd')
to_char(sysdate, 'yy/mm/dd') <=v_date and v_date <=to_char(sysdate+2, 'yy/mm/dd')
to_char(sysdate, 'yy/mm/dd') <=v_date and v_date <=to_char(sysdate+6, 'yy/mm/dd')
mapper.select: select v_num, v_name, v_phone, to_char(v_date, 'yyyy-mm-dd') as v_date, v_time, v_status from visit_tbl where v_num=#{v_num}
mapper.update: update visit_tbl set v_status='2' where v_num=#{v_num}
